QuestData.Title: The Final Ingredient
QuestData.Description: The potion is complete, $n. Soon our journey will be over. There is one last thing I would have you do for me, then you shall have your reward.$b$bMy wife's bow was kept here, but I have not been able to find it after searching everywhere. There is potent magic in it.$b$bI fear one of the restless spirits may have taken it, but it would take a powerful force to pick up an item such as this. Be careful.
QuestData.CompletionText: What was that? I heard a familiar voice... it couldn't be.
QuestData.RewardText: You saw Latara? What happened?$b$b... I see. I am so sorry I failed you, my love.
